doc:
Kevin Page (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kevin_Page_(actor) 0 Kevin Page, also credited as Ken Page, born 1959, is an actor. He is perhaps best known for his recurring roles on Dallas as Steven Bum Jones, right-hand man of J.R. Ewing and on Seinfeld as Stu Chermack. He also appears in the 1987 film RoboCop as Mr. Kinney, a young executive who is violently killed by an ED-209 police robot during a boardroom demonstration gone wrong. Kevin_Page , also_credited as Ken_Page , born 1959 , is an_actor . He is_perhaps_best_known for his_recurring_roles on Dallas as Steven_Bum_Jones , right-hand_man of J.R._Ewing and on Seinfeld as Stu_Chermack . He also appears in the_1987_film RoboCop as Mr._Kinney , a_young_executive who is_violently_killed by an_ED-209_police_robot during a_boardroom_demonstration gone wrong .
